description: One of the oldest cocktails, Tom Collins is a simple drink that consists of&nbsp;gin, lemon juice, sugar, and carbonated water. This cocktail has been around for centuries but remains one of the most popular drinks in bars today.
name: Tom Collins
recipeIngredient: Lemon wheel and maraschino cherry for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Pour gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a tom collins glass with ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup into a tom collins glass with ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Top off the drink with club soda, give it one stir. Garnish with a lemon wheel or maraschino cherry on top!
